the reflections served by aa.org/api/reflections/{DATE_STRING_FORMATTED_`DD/MM`} are HTML that needs to be parsed for sections and reformatted for discord, i decided at the time that it wasn't worth doing for myself only. though I have an incomplete branch on a private fork for the hazelden books.

long story short, poking ðŸ˜…
